template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a realistic end-to-end operational workflow in the {industry} domain that would require coordinating multiple tools, resolving at least one constraint, updating systems, and delivering a final outcome; output only the prompt text and keep it under 40 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a realistic end-to-end operational workflow in the manufacturing domain that would require coordinating multiple tools, resolving at least one constraint, updating systems, and delivering a final outcome; output only the prompt text and keep it under 40 words.

message.content: Resolve a part shortage, coordinate procurement and production, update inventory and scheduling, and assemble and ship the finished product to meet the customer deadline.
message.reasoning_content:
Okay, the user wants a single-sentence prompt under 40 words that describes a realistic manufacturing workflow. Let me break down the requirements.

First, it needs to be end-to-end operational, so covering from start to finish. Multiple tools must be coordinated, like inventory systems or production software. There’s also at least one constraint to resolve, maybe material shortages or scheduling conflicts.

Updating systems is another point—perhaps adjusting inventory or production logs after resolving the constraint. The final outcome should be clear, like delivering a finished product. 

Keeping it under 40 words means being concise. Avoiding jargon, using plain English. Maybe a scenario involving part shortages, coordinating procurement and production, updating inventory, and shipping the final product. 

Let me check the word count. Ensure it flows naturally as one sentence. Make sure all elements are included without being overly detailed.
